column4: does anyone else have problems with random quits in apps in breezey?
which apps?
sometimes gaim, sometimes my clock, sometimes firefox
i have no problem with gaim and the clock, but firefox exits for me when i change from a page that contains streaming media (which i solved but i guess your problem is different)
ya, i'm not sure why it does it though, my memory is at 100% though, which kind of frightens me
which program is using all the memory?
java, java_vm, nautilus, and firefox-bin
310mb,230mb, 148mb, 116mb respectively
um i just fixed that, hold on let me find it real quick
that's weird... firefox is using 111 for me but nautilus only 40.. what is java running for?
facebook for picture upload
i think it's because i'm viewing a bunch of pictures in a folder
that still doesn't explain the weird crashing of gaim and nautilus.. are you using breezy?
by the way how did you fix the 'do not disconnect' with the ipod
i'm lookin' for it real quick, my cable is slow
thanks
i'm sorry this is takin' so long, i kinda lost it  again lol
i managed to get rid of the 'do not disconnect' by remounting it and instead of umount using eject
you don't remmeber how you did it?
well there is a way of making it disconnect properly if you quit out of gtkpod, like it does it automatically
http://taint.org/wk/IpodOnBreezy
thanks
